game.name: Aliosso
game.shortDescription: Combine tiles and run-changing cards to unleash power-packed combos and crush your enemies. Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Combine tiles and run-changing cards to unleash power-packed combos and crush your enemies. Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn!
